website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you have lightweight curtains. If you need a stronger rod for heavier material, however, you should consider other options.
pros: Sleek satin nickel finish and contemporary design
Large, round finials stand out and look great
cons: not ideal for thick, heavy curtains

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We just wanted this to use in our kitchen to hang up our pots and pans to clear up some space and it works pretty well. It seemed a bit flimsy at first, but it is doing a pretty good job at holding up steel and ceramic cookware. It should definitely hold up some cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.andMrs.MorenoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best I could find for the price. Love the simple look.
customer_reviews.author: bw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got the white ones for my baby's room and they're perfect
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Soule

customer_reviews.title: Feee Frustration packaging
customer_reviews.text: The rod looks fine to me. The pole is smaller than the pics. My beef is that the pole is wrapped in cheap plastic, you can’t rip it off, it tears in half inch prices. What the heck. Also the pole doesn’t twist and lock into place like most poles. I had to tape mine into place. Needless to say I’ll look for something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Heyijustmetyou

customer_reviews.title: Can't find better quality at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Looked all around for black curtain rods to go with my farmhouse decor and these were the best I could find at the cheapest price. I wasn't expecting much but I was very pleasantly surprised at how great they look. These fit many size windows and are adjustable which is great when you have many windows of different sizes. This even fit my extra large living room window which is about 84" inches wide and it isn't flimsy at all. Perfect addition to my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Excellent: Light, Bright, and super easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Requires scissors to open the packaging it was packed so well. The shrink wrap was hard to get off the rod! They look great; arrived in perfect condition. 1” Above frame and one inch over from the window frame: rod placement - left 1” from the floor. Hold-backs: placed 39 inches up from the floor and 2 inches from the frame. Placed the hardware in less than ten minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Randy A. Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy But.........
customer_reviews.text: Giving 4 stars because: 1. Metal for entire rod is nice and sturdy along with screws on brackets to hold rod in place. 2. Please, don't make the same mistake I did by removing all plastic covering on end and then screwing ball into place. The metal rod slipped and cut my thumb. The second rod I left plastic on, screwed ball into place and then removed the plastic covering. 3. This is painted and it peels off. So no it is not bronze it is cheaply painted. Overall, it's a nice rod to hang grommet curtains on and is thin enough for rod type curtains. I do like the color but too bad it's painted.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: the plastic wrapped on the entire length of this adjustable part of the rod is extremely annoying. You will wonder how hard can it be
customer_reviews.text: The rod is adjustable. But I wish it had the mechanism for one to twist-and-lock the adjusted length. In this one, the thinner inserted rod slides back and forth when you are trying to assemble it. CONTINUOUSLY!!! Also, the plastic wrapped on the entire length of this adjustable part of the rod is extremely annoying. You will wonder how hard can it be! All it needs is peeling off a plastic! NO!!! This hard plastic breaks into tiny mini pieces, poking into your nails and dirtying the entire place. It's just these little things which unnecessarily make a very simple 5minutes thing into a long task you can't wait to get done with.
customer_reviews.author: saheli

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy install, nice looking, toddler proof so far!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy product. Always had the flimsy cheap cheap curtain rods before. The type that bend if toddlers pull on them, and are dreadfully ugly. Bought these to replace those. Very nice upgrade. These look simple but attractive. They are much more sturdy, and can stand up to toddler yanking. The hardware is decent. Not all flimsy, not super strong, just functional, which is fine for me. Easy to install, easy to remove curtains for cleaning. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: rpmnoel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! As described ! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product...normal in size for my bedroom window and still had plenty of stretch left in the rod. I got ripped off by a previous seller I received a tiny miniature rod n was very upset but with this seller everything was PERFECT 👌
customer_reviews.author: eena

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but Packaging Makes a Mess!
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality curtain rods, which is to be expected from Bali.... BUT, the packaging makes a big mess and the shrink wrap around the rod itself is a pain to remove... It's good that they include it though, as it prevents the finish from being marred.... And the screws they include are pretty low quality..It's very easy to strip them out when using a drill-driver.... Other than that, I'd say you get what you pay for and I'm generally satisfied...
customer_reviews.author: MLL

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL - Second to none!
customer_reviews.text: This is simple review! These curtains are made exceptionally well and are super smooth to the touch. I also purchased some nice rods to compliment the curtains! The rods along with the curtains look amazing. The brackets and screws are easy to install (drill recommended) and they simply tighten the the rods down on the brackets. Took about 30 minutes for 2 windows. Well packed and easy as 1,2,3! Buy them! I am redoing 2 more rooms with them!
customer_reviews.author: Pandora Black

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: What’s with the shrink wrap on the small half of the bar? It took me like 10 minutes to peel it all off. Very frustrating. The ball that screws in doesn’t go all the way in either leaving a gap at the end. I tried using tools to get it flush but it was impossible. I ordered two and had the same issue with both. I used my own double brackets for hanging so I can’t speak for those. They look fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: No way to secure adjustable lengths in one position
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works fine, only complaint is there's no way to secure the adjustable rod to one length, so it wobbles when fully extended and sometimes if my kids move the curtains too fast when the rod is fully extended, it wobbles out and falls off. But that's rare, and as long as it's not fully extended, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: For anyone who doesn't read very carefully like myself, although, it says it's a set it's only one curtain rod. I really like these rods, but the shrink wrap around them was near impossible to get off. I plan to hang them up with command hooks, they fit in the jumbo hooks. I'm not sure, but they'd probably fit in the next size down that come in brushed nickle, but the jumbo ones that are white blend with my walls and the rods if you get white.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid, I'm satisfied but just to warn anyone looking at it, there is nothing to hold it together. the two ends slide together, one side sliding inside the other, but there is nothing that prevents it from sliding right back out again. I've pulled the curtains open and accidentally caused the bar to spread. Not a big deal to me, it still looks nice and does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good product, typical install issues
customer_reviews.text: Even after reading many of the reviews complaining about the 'cheap' screws and the problems with stripping the soft heads I decided to order some. The price is great. I can tell you that, after putting up countless curtain rods for my wife every one of them has issues with the screw heads. With all curtain rod brackets, it is difficult to get a screwdriver lined up straight with the head. I found that a little patience and care in lining up the screwdriver I was able to successfully screw them in completely. This is true putting them into wood as well as the plastic anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Heavy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I will never understand why you shrink wrapped the inside rod! It took me longer to get the shrink wrap off than it did for me to install the whole thing. The final would not screw all the way in either. I will not purchase another one like this again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Leonard

customer_reviews.title: It's a poor design and cheap
customer_reviews.text: The ends don't really fasten well. It's a poor design and cheap. Once the ends are screwed on you don't know what part is going to unscrew. Eventually you just have to push it back together. On one of my curtain rods the ball and the faster separates, and on the other the inner plastic thread adapter screws out with the ball. It makes cleaning the curtains a jigsaw puzzle of parts.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid and what I needed, I was happy with this purchase. Sturdy and looks much more expensive than what I paid for it. The only issue I had was that one end was stripped so I couldn’t get the finial on all the way and straight. Wasn’t a big issue for me considering where the rod is placed. And I could have sent it back for a replacement but I choose not to.
customer_reviews.author: S. Baker

customer_reviews.title: the "set" does not contain 2 curtain rods
customer_reviews.text: Although in the question/answer section of the information about the Bali rods there was specific information stating that each "set" came with two rods, the "set" I only received 1 rod per "set." I was anticipating to receive 4 rods in the package I received today because I ordered 2 "sets." Th rod is great; however, because of the incorrect information, my project is delayed. I will need to be ordering another "set" in order to put up all of my curtains at the same time. Please provide specific and correct information in the description of products being sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product for the price but seems a bit flimsy. The plastic piece that adjusts the length of the pole broke when I tried to use it and the piece that holds the end in also broke when I first screwed it in. I managed to make it work because I will not be moving these anytime soon and didn't want to bother with a return. There are honestly cheaper alternatives at Walmart that are probably of comparable or higher quality. It's fine though, and looks decent. Wouldn't order again though.
customer_reviews.author: Andreanna

customer_reviews.title: saved me a trip to the store and I am happy.
customer_reviews.text: basic rod. saved me a trip to the store and I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A Geisendorf

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice for rods, holds steady, and all ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid choice for rods, holds steady, and all of the screws and mounts are included. Well worth the price. Would get 5 stars, but it seems even at fully closed length, the smaller internal rod still sticks out by about an inch from the larger outer rod. Not a big deal if you're not picky, but is something to note if you're looking for seamless precision.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vallon

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I read about a few complaints people had with removing the plastic protector sheet from the inside rod. I had no problem. It took two tugs and it was off. You could even leave it on. I never tired using the screws that came with it, as we had our own stainless steel ones from another project. I am happy with these and I have installed them in an outdoor Lanai.
customer_reviews.author: J Delelys

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, but extender cheapens the look
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy install (under 10 mins) for a not very handy girl like me. My star reduction and complaint is why would they put the extender right smack in the middle?! I have standard size windows and logically this would extend to the side so it’s covered by a curtain panel instead of dead center. I think I makes it look cheap and I am now on the search for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price, but you get what you pay for. The plastic piece that the finial screws into comes out and the finials themselves are difficult to screw in. They obviously don’t have a “high quality” look to them. I didn’t put the middle support in and they are just strong enough to hold up the curtains. I could definitely see the need for the 3rd support with floor length curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Recommend using different screws as they damage easily. Came with mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: StayAtHomeDad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! (But ORDER SEPARATE ROD HANGERS OR U WILL BE SORRY 😐!!)
customer_reviews.text: I like these-but can not give them a 5 star rating that I want to with a good conscience. They’re beautiful, but you HAVE to buy a separate rod hangers, or you’ll be sorry. I’m SO glad I listened to the reviews, & did just that. You’re going to need different rod-hangers! But besides that, beautiful rod!
customer_reviews.author: Sol Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod Set
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two sets of these rods with plans to purchase another. For the price, they suit my needs and look great. I did not use the hardware that came with the rods, I purchased Kwik Hang hardware because I don't own a drill and was not going to purchase one just to hang curtain rods. Kwik Hang does not require drilling and has no screws, etc. For the money, these rods are a great buy, look good, and suit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Ball Single Drapery Rod in a black finish is perfect for adding style to any room.
customer_reviews.text: This rod is very sturdy, has some weight to it, package came Included with this set is a 5/8 inch metal single rod, two ball decorative final end pieces, three sturdy mounting brackets, 6 screws, 6 drywall anchors and installation instructions. The bracket projection (from wall to end of bracket) is 3 inches. The tools you will need for the installation: pencil, tape measure, drill or screw driver. Clean/dust with a slightly damp cloth. Very easy to attach to wall.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Bronze About It
customer_reviews.text: I bought the “Bronze” color, but it is NOT bronze. Based on the other color names, I would call this “Glossy Brown”, because that’s what it is. There is nothing bronze about this color, it’s just dark brown with a glossy finish. Apart from that, the product works as expected, just bummed about the color.
customer_reviews.author: Aly W.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This rod was the perfect addition to my new drapes. I love the color, it was easy to assemble, and when one came bent, the replacement process was quick and easy. The only slightly negative thing I can say is my grommet top drapes get a little caught on where the two pieces connect, but I’m sure that will happen with any adjustable rod. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon G.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my girls' room and it was just what I was looking for. Sturdy, attractive, easy to install. The curtains in the room are fairly heavy and they are used by children and I've had no problems with this feeling flimsy - very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: walley5

customer_reviews.title: Cheap screws break on install
customer_reviews.text: The freaking screw broke when I was screwing it into the wall the head snapped right off. Now I have a screw stuck in my wall and when I install my next curtain rod I’ll have to move it out a half inch or so. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Goza

customer_reviews.title: Width is accurate yet if used to fullest length may require reinforcements.
customer_reviews.text: I totally love the fair price of this cafe rod. Order a longer width in size if you want it to be sturdy and stay together at the mid point. I had to tape the middle to increase sturdiness due to width of my window. Otherwise a great value and simple design that doesn’t distract from beauty of your curtains or drapes!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the sturdiness of these items, especially as a 2 pack. They were light weight and easy to install, even as an 8 month pregnant woman. These curtain rods made 2 steps of my nesting process easier. I got both the new nursery and my toddler’s room curtained in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Evolvingclone

customer_reviews.title: After putting up one of the brackets and carefully measuring ...
customer_reviews.text: After putting up one of the brackets and carefully measuring where to put the second one, I drilled in the screw and the head of the screw broke off. It was in too far to take out even with needle nose plyers. Now I have the tip of a screw sticking out of my wall and my drape rods are not centered. I know these aren't expensive rods but to use cheap hardware, come on!
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Much thicker than my previous curtains rods. They provide a lot of support for my blackout curtains!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rod! Looks great and it's sturdy! I saw the review where the person said there was no hole to put the screw. I thought the same thing until I pulled the more slender end all the way out and the other end had the hole! Check it out!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Not Full Curtain Rod
customer_reviews.text: What you see in the photo I added to the review is exactly what came out of the box it was sent in. I received half of a curtain rod in torn packaging. No second half, no mounting hardware. On top of that, the knob was scratched up and damaged, so even if it had been the full set, and I had mounting hardware to put it up, it still wouldn't have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn’t pleased with this curtain rod it’s made really cheap. I didn’t feel like returning so just hung it up. It did the trick but it should of come with 3 brackets for the middle which it didn’t we had an extra one already
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, light enough to be held by command hooks
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and didn't want to have to screw things into the wall, so I got this and two large command hooks. I thought for sure it was going to fall off, but this was light enough, that there was no issue. It also looks sturdy, adding a nice touch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Brown not bronze
customer_reviews.text: I would describe the "bronze" as a chocolate brown rather than a "bronze." It is not a metallic finish and it is not variegated like a typical oil-rubbed bronze finish. That worked fine for me but someone who was looking for more of a bronze might be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are HIGH quality and look amazing. I love them, the look great. I used to buy all my rods from big lots, but those are all cheap plastic and you can really tell the difference. These came fast and are worth the price (which I consider pretty low!).
customer_reviews.author: AbsAbsAbs007

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and put up; I used command hooks to hang them and they are sitting perfectly. They come with their own rod holders but I don’t have the time for that!
customer_reviews.author: Kohoudini

customer_reviews.title: Just terrible
customer_reviews.text: Really low quality product. Spent half an hour just getting the shrink wrap off. The mollys the come to hang it all fell apart in the wall. And if you try to open it even remotely close to the full length is sags in the middle. Absolutely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Okay...
customer_reviews.text: Received this item and was kind of disappointed. It's and all black curtain rod that is 2 separate pieces for adjusting to size at the end of piece 1 there is a white cap that is very noticeable and even when fully closed to the shortest size it's visible. Maybe that's just my OCD but it's kind of weak. Any kind of tugs by a child could probably bend the rod.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hauch

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: You definitely get what you pay for.. screws that come with it are GARBAGE and the end screws into a piece of plastic instead of the bar itself. My end wouldn't screw on all the way because the plastic was turning inside. I would have returned if I didn't need it immediately
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Brown not bronze
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as bronze. It is not even close, it's brown paint and looks nothing like bronze. I've passed my return window now, as I bought these for our new house and didn't unbox them until after the move. Big mistake! Now I have two brown curtain rods I have no use for
customer_reviews.author: Trish H

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy screws and hangers. Rod itself is okay but the screws weren’t durable & bent when I tried to put them in drywall. Used new screws and as long as I don’t try to move my curtains they stay. Every time the wind blows the curtain it falls off because the pocket on the hanger isn’t quite right to keep it in sturdy on the left side. Overall extremely disappointed in the purchase. Would return if I hadn’t ruined screws & scratched the bar during attempted installation.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Bowing when extended
customer_reviews.text: Great price if you’re not going to extend this rod at all. When extended, there is some bowing that occurs in the center of the rod. I can’t imagine installing my heavy black currents, with these being extended to 38”.
customer_reviews.author: E. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not made very well. The ends don't screw in completely.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Staggs

customer_reviews.title: Slips and slides
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a “slip on” curtain on an opening that is less than the max extension. Had to tape the two sides together, as the friction of the curtain being opened would lengthen the rod.
customer_reviews.author: ultrafuchsia

customer_reviews.title: Upscale at low cost.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Looks more upscale than I thought. Great deal. Clean and simple looking, and boasts a bit of oomph. I was surprised how nice they were for how little I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great curtain rod,
customer_reviews.text: Even though I had to return these because my valances just wouldn’t fit in the 5/8 opening, they are beautiful & just what I wanted (except for that minor detail). You’d need a 1” curtain/drape opening to work.
customer_reviews.author: P. Laird

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality curtain rods that look good and does its job!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, not so great seller.
customer_reviews.text: The product is just fine I would recommend it. I would however recommend d you find a different seller. Our delivery date was changed 4 times. At one point we were notified that it shipped only to have tje delivery date change again and then two weeks later receive another notification that it had shipped. In the end it took over two months to receive the product which was great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Trocolla

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Has no way of "locking" the rod at the length you want, so it will slide back and forth as you're installing it. It still works fine, though, so I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product was terrible to install. Clips kept breaking, as well as the shrink wrap was a pain to get off. The end caps twist in the end of the rod, so you can’t even twist those on easily. Very cheaply made and I would not recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Very well packaged!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a good price. I've bought panes of glass that weren't packaged as well as this curtain rod!
customer_reviews.author: ELISA ADCOCK

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how nice and sturdy this was considering the price. I was expecting a cheap rod that'd look nice enough to use in a back room. It's not! It is a nice, heavy rod that looks great!
customer_reviews.author: JC in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Shrink wrap from hell
customer_reviews.text: The curtain rod itself is fine. Decent quality for the price. However, it arrives with the portion of rod that slides into the outer portion wrapped in a film that is next to impossible to remove. It is brittle, breaks off in tiny pieces. It says to remove, so it is supposed to come off. I will not order this again, shame because I need some more. But I have better things to do with my life than spend an afternoon removing plastic wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Ebba Hansen

customer_reviews.title: An excellent deal. Will purchase more for this price.
customer_reviews.text: Made of metal, to my surprise. Very sturdy when hanging thick blackout drapes. Has a 3rd hook to brace the middle. Didn't use the drywall anchors, I screwed the hardware into the studs.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Wrapper made me nuts!
customer_reviews.text: The rod is perfectly good but the wrapper was a bastard to get off! Really had me frustrated! Other then that, the actual rod is sturdy and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking & great quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I was looking for. Easy to install & great quality. I hang curtains up during the cold winter months to help with my drafts.
customer_reviews.author: walley

customer_reviews.title: very nice with a slight issue
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this rod and it easily worked well with a pair of semi sheers with grommets. Installation wasn't too hard but, I was slightly disappointed the ball on the end did not screw in great (there is a small space) but, the curtain covers the flaw.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: They work great and were easy to install
customer_reviews.text: They work great and were easy to install. I’m using them for heavy-ish curtains and they hold up just fine. I didn’t even need to install the middle bracket and they are holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking rods
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking rods and easy to install, however, it took me longer to get the plastic off the rods (there were no perforations) than it did to install them.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Used this in a mobile home. Installed easily and hasn't come loose, even with a five year old pulling the grommet curtains on it.
customer_reviews.author: P E

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is pretty great. The shrink wrap around the pole is a little difficult to remove, but if you have a straight blade razor laying around, you will be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Burr

customer_reviews.title: Good for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they work great. Probably best used for a bedroom window, not sturdy enough for heavy drapes in a community area.
customer_reviews.author: Lunch

customer_reviews.title: Really great!
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally bent my previous curtain rod. This one is much better, smooth and sturdy. In fact it's so sturdy that for a day I had to fight the temptation of trying to see if I could rip it out.
customer_reviews.author: Bakhtiyar Neymanov

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to hang curtains in my living room. I was a little hesitant because they were so cheap. I was afraid they would be flimsy but they look nice and they feel pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty curtain rod
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the white one x2 for master bedroom to match white crown molding and painted doors Very pleased with look
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: You’re better off just going to bed bath and beyond or ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap materials, the screws wouldn’t even go in my walls and left huge holes until I used the ones I had. The ball part doesn’t stay on to the end. You’re better off just going to bed bath and beyond or somewhere similar. This is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Tahir

customer_reviews.title: Works for Us
customer_reviews.text: It can be "locked" to a certain length, but we switch out different wall hangings of different sizes seasonally. So we just tape it with masking tape where the two parts meet.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A. Godsey-bell

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and easy to install. The rod is a dark bronze and feels lightweight, so it doesn't require a lot of installation help or tools.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but poor quality hanging accessories
customer_reviews.text: The screws stripped and we had to go buy our own. There is also a plastic wrap around the rod that must be removed prior to use and it’s super hard to get off without scratching the rod. However, it does look good once up!
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine and Saajen Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Very dark almost black
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a nice curtain rod but it looked dang near black not bronze so I returned it. Just be conscious of the color when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle1

customer_reviews.title: Only one rod not an actual
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that you use the word “set” because that indicates it comes with 2 rods for 2 windows when in reality it’s 1 rod for 1 window. Had I known I wouldn’t have purchased it. Please change your wording so you’re not misleading people.
customer_reviews.author: keren

customer_reviews.title: fast decorating
customer_reviews.text: I used these with large command strip hooks so I dont damage my walls I also dont have tools lol. The 5/8 diameter fits just right!! Good luck people!
customer_reviews.author: Jyoti Singh

customer_reviews.title: I liked the set so much I ordered another
customer_reviews.text: High quality, simple to install and priced right. I liked the set so much I ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: zx10rrider

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy rod and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy rod. Nice presentation. Easy to install. Would recommend because it is not flimsy and mahes my curtains hanging nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Roe

customer_reviews.title: Decent, if you’re in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these rods. One of them went together fairly easily. The other two I had a little bit of difficulty with. The round ends screw into the ends of the rod. Two of them didn’t go on all the way, so there was a bit of a gap and and exposed bit of the threaded screw that attaches the round into the rod.
customer_reviews.author: CMWellness

customer_reviews.title: Rod colors don't match
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They are durable enough and, in shape and size, look as expected. However, I got the nickel rods and am very displeased at the colors. The smaller rod was covered in hard shrink wrap that was annoying af to remove. The larger rod was not covered and a totally different color and finish (matte vs shiny). It is definitely noticeable. I would return it had I noticed sooner and hadn't already installed it on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Beatnic

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap! The knob wouldn’t screw in without some extra work. These are just cheap & poor quality curtain rods. Spend the extra money for something better!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Breit

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very very cheap, hardware is cheap as well. The end caps spin so you can't screw them on properly without taking the railing a part. If they put more money onto the product instead of the wrapping and bag and may be decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth
customer_reviews.text: If you never put up curtains before please go watch a YouTube video. And you will need a power drill to install. Other than that I love them. They make everything come together nicely
customer_reviews.author: Corvetta Fluellen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Looks great in the rooms I have it in. Simple, which I like
customer_reviews.author: Jchuk16

customer_reviews.title: Installed in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install in our son's nursery. We put custom window treatments on them and get lots of compliments on the style.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Daly

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy for smaller rods!
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and well made. The silver looks like silver.. not cheaply made plastic look.
customer_reviews.author: KrisTina Seward

customer_reviews.title: great curtain rod
customer_reviews.text: These are great for window dressings, they were so easy to install and so strong... they look good too (I have the brown color )
customer_reviews.author: S. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Easy all around! Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the first review I’ve ever done but I just wanted to say I had NO problem with the shrink wrap. It came off in two pieces, I just started at the top and spun the rod so it came off in a diagonal down the rod. Also I saw the bronze was more of a brown which is what I needed and it is in fact BROWN, but perfect for me! Can’t beat the price, it’s really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Antique Bronze
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Satin and got the Antique Bronze, but kept it anyway because it coordinated with the walls and sheer curtains.
customer_reviews.author: PitbullDad

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great curtain rod.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a nice looking curtain rod. Easy to install, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Malave

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: They make the room look more elegant. I love them. I now have them in every room.
customer_reviews.author: ruema

customer_reviews.title: NO QUALITY CONTROL
customer_reviews.text: This is missing 1 ball and NO hardware! You can see where bag was cut open. I would just like one ball that is missing
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and nice
customer_reviews.text: This curtain rod is the best one I’ve found so far even in stores. It’s sturdy not cheap at all for the price and durability you can’t go wrong with this item. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leyla S

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these. They are metal which makes them a great deal given their low price. Easy to install. Only issue i had was one was sent to me with a yellow stain all down the one pole. I contacted amazon and they sent me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Linsalata

product_meta.title: Bali Blinds 5/8" Ball Cafe Rod Set, 48-84", Satin Nickel
product_meta.description: Color:Satin Nickel| Size:48-84"Add simple style to your space with the Bali 5/8" Ball Decorative Café Rod Set. This rod will hold your favorite drapery to help achieve your desired look, while the simple finish will blend in with your existing décor. Each end of the Bali 5/8" Ball Decorative Café Rod is capped with a decorative ball that brings a fun final touch to your window.
